sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Slovak: Vojna výkrik pre spravodlivosť bola všetka - veľa na Chagrin of orgánov.
backtrans: War shout for justice was all - a lot to Chagrin of organs.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
backtrans: The regime decision frees the basic program.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Slovak: Spoločenstvo bolo znepokojené nad prechodom veľmi potrebných reforiem.
backtrans: The Community was concerned about the transition of very needed reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Slovak: Think Tank publikoval dokument, ktorý načrtol ich ospravedlnenie trestu smrti.
backtrans: Think Tank published a document that sketched their apologies of death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Augught was left to validity of petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Slovak: Prezident nabádal svojich ministrov, aby sa vrátil, pretože kľúčovú podporu opozície pre jeho ekonomický plán sa chystal sponu.
backtrans: The President encouraged his ministers to return because the key support of the opposition for his economic plan was a clasp.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Slovak: Voliči boli chvapaní, aby videli účet.
backtrans: The voters were troubled to see an account.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
backtrans: Discurrent narrative of the lawyer has triggered the jury.
The Court of First Instance ordered the violence!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Slovak: Blok EÚ sa proti prípadnému uloženiu antidumpingových opatrení.
backtrans: EU block against any imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Slovak: Fulsome Eulogy bola doručená slovestnou radou.
backtrans: Fulsome Eulogy was delivered to a verb board.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Slovak: Agentúra GIG-ENOPY sa rozhodla ozdobiť náhrady!
backtrans: Gig-enopy has decided to decorate compensation!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Slovak: Členovia anti-teokratického revolučného pohybu zvrhli rovesníkov pri moci!
backtrans: Members of Anti-Teocratic Revolutionary Motion Trapped Peers at Power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Slovak: Zostavujúci zradcov sa rozhodol bojovať s kolonialistami.
backtrans: The compilation of traitors decided to fight colonialists.
